casebody.data:
STATE v. LUNSFORD No. COA05-804. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed November 15, 2005. Certification Date December 5, 2005 Appeal from the Caldwell (04CRS5020,04CRS5021, 04CRS5022).

Case Reported Without Published Opinion. Affirm judgments in case numbers 04CRS5020 and 04CRS5021; Remand for corrections judgment in case number 04CRS5022.
